org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos

Class StreamDataProviderFactory<ProducerType extends IDataProducerModule<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.impl.service.sos.StreamDataProviderFactory<ProducerType>
  • Type Parameters:
    ProducerType - Type of producer handled by this provider
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEventListener, ISOSDataProviderFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SensorDataProviderFactory, StreamProcessProviderFactory

    public class StreamDataProviderFactory<ProducerType extends IDataProducerModule<?>>
extends Object
implements ISOSDataProviderFactory, IEventListener

    Base factory for streaming data providers.

    Since:
    Feb 28, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin
